generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending from the foreground to the background, with visible markings, qualifies as a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side, bordered by a curb and a building, is designated for pedestrians and cyclists, thus a sidewalk.
- building: The ornate structure with arched windows and columns in the background, as well as the modern building on the right, are both buildings.
- wall: The textured grey wall on the left side of the image is an individual standing wall.
- pole: The vertical metal pole holding traffic signs on the right side of the image is a pole.
- traffic sign: The circular "No Parking" sign and the "30 Zone" sign on the right, as well as the triangular yield sign and the blue directional sign on the left, are traffic signs.
- vegetation: The green bush on the right side of the image is vegetation.
- person: The individual walking on the left side of the street and the person walking in the middle distance are both people.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle in the middle distance is a rider.
- bicycle: The bicycle being ridden by the person in the middle distance is a bicycle.
